description:
INCLUDED IN 2014 PARENTS MAGAZINE 70 BEST APPS FOR FAMILIES!

ChoreMonster makes chores fun by engaging and rewarding your kids!

●  Kids earn points by completing their chores
●  Earn rewards like ice cream, an hour of Xbox, or a camping trip
●  Win monsters at the Monster Carnival (over 100 available, more being added monthly!)
●  Parents manage their children’s chores and the rewards they can earn
●  Takes the tension out of household chores

Don’t just take our word for it.  Here’s what ChoreMonster users are saying:

“Set the kids up on @ChoreMonster. So far it's a hit in the household with K wanting to complete a week's worth of chores by 8:00 am.”

“Incredible things happening since I installed @ChoreMonster app. My boys can't wait to help around the house!”

“Day one of using @ChoreMonster and the kids were pumped...woke up early to log on and asked for more chores when I tucked them in.”

...or these popular publications:

“We now give fewer ultimatums, engage in less browbeating, and have more time to relax…with the kids!” -- Mister Mom Blog

ChoreMonster “...makes it more likely that the trash can is emptied, the toys are put away, and the vegetables are consumed…” -- The New York Times

“The makers of ChoreMonster have worked hard to get the app accessible for younger hands and minds.”  -- Geek Dad/Wired Magazine

We’ve been covered by Mashable, The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, TechCrunch, and more.

ChoreMonster is best for ages 4 through 12, but works with ages 3 through 15.  If you need help teaching your kids how to do chores, check out our companion app, ChorePicker.

Your kids will beg to do their chores!  Download ChoreMonster today.
trackCensoredName: ChoreMonster: make chores fun for kids!
trackName: ChoreMonster: make chores fun for kids!
releaseNotes:
- Parents! We've added a widget to help track your child's chores for the day, right from the Notification Center.
- Fixed some bugs.
